body_html:
can you use the commands on the website (i.e. use the -c pytorch channel).
The pytorch-cpu package has no declared dependency on cudatoolkit or cudnn. https://github.com/pytorch/builder/blob/master/conda/pytorch-cpu-0.3.1/meta.yaml#L18-L22
body_text:
can you use the commands on the website (i.e. use the -c pytorch channel).
The pytorch-cpu package has no declared dependency on cudatoolkit or cudnn. https://github.com/pytorch/builder/blob/master/conda/pytorch-cpu-0.3.1/meta.yaml#L18-L22
body:
can you use the commands on the website (i.e. use the `-c pytorch` channel).
The pytorch-cpu package has no declared dependency on `cudatoolkit` or `cudnn`. https://github.com/pytorch/builder/blob/master/conda/pytorch-cpu-0.3.1/meta.yaml#L18-L22
